class.name: BBCodeParserAttribute
class.brief_description: [BBCodeParser] stores bbcode attributes using this class.
class.description: [BBCodeParser] stores bbcode attributes using this class. It has helper methods for searching and modifying data.

method.name: contains_data
method.description: Returns whether the given string is fount in the stored data.

method.name: convert_to_string
method.description: Convert the parsed tree to a scring.

method.name: match_all_data
method.description: Match all given strings agains the stored data.

members.member: Is this a sinlge attribute? Does not have parameters (with =).
